XsVersion Class Reference

A class to store version information. More...

Public Member Functions

 XsVersion (int maj, int min, int rev, int build, const XsString &extra)
 Constructs a version object using the supplied parameters or an empty version object if no parameters are given.
 
 XsVersion (int maj=0, int min=0, int rev=0, int build=0, int reposVersion=0, const XsString &extra=XsString())
 Constructs a version object using the supplied parameters or an empty version object if no parameters are given.
 
 XsVersion (const XsString &vString)
 Constructs a version object based upon the version contained by vString.
 
 XsVersion (const XsSimpleVersion &simpleVersion)
 Constructs a version object based upon the version contained by simpleVersion.
 
 XsVersion (const XsVersion &other)
 Constructs a version object based upon the other object.
 
XsVersion & operator= (const XsVersion &other)
 Assign the version from the other object.
 
bool isEqual (const XsVersion &other) const
 Test if the other version is equal to this. The comparison involves the entire object.
 
bool operator== (const XsVersion &other) const
 Test if the other version is equal to this. The comparison involves only the version numbers (major, minor and revision).
 
bool operator!= (const XsVersion &other) const
 Test if the other version is NOT equal to this. The comparison involves only the version numbers (major, minor and revision).
 
bool operator< (const XsVersion &other) const
 Test if the other version is lower than this. The comparison involves only the version numbers (major, minor and revision).
 
bool operator<= (const XsVersion &other) const
 Test if the other version is lower or equal than this. The comparison involves only the version numbers (major, minor and revision).
 
bool operator> (const XsVersion &other) const
 Test if the other version is higher than this. The comparison involves only the version numbers (major, minor and revision).
 
bool operator>= (const XsVersion &other) const
 Test if the other version is higher or equal than this. The comparison involves only the version numbers (major, minor and revision).
 
bool empty () const
 Test if this is a null-version.
 
XsString toString () const
 Get a string with the version expressed in a readable format.
 
XsString toSimpleString () const
 Get a string with the version expressed in a readable format.
 
XsSimpleVersion toSimpleVersion () const
 Create a XsSimpleVersion (version) from a XsVersion.
 
int major () const
 Return the major part of the version.
 
int minor () const
 Return the minor part of the version.
 
int revision () const
 Return the revision part of the version.
 
int build () const
 Return the build number used for this build.
 
int reposVersion () const
 Return the source revision used for this build.
 
const XsString & extra () const
 Return the extra part of the version. This may contain custom version details such as 'beta' or 'Mk4' to indicate the readiness and purpose of this version of the object.
 
void setMajor (int major)
 Set the major part of the version.
 
void setMinor (int minor)
 Set the minor part of the version.
 
void setRevision (int revision)
 Set the revision part of the version.
 
void setBuild (int build)
 Set the build part of the version.
 
void setReposVersion (int reposVersion)
 Set the reposVersion part of the version.
 
void setExtra (const XsString &extra)
 Set the extra part of the version. This may contain custom version details such as 'beta' or 'Mk4' to indicate the readiness and purpose of this version of the object.

Detailed Description

A class to store version information.
